baseline_groups.claim_summary: Rule of 72 educational video improves financial competence (alignment between complex and simple financial valuations).
baseline_groups.notes: Exp A: coef=3.82 (p=0.010). Exp B: coef=3.66 (p=0.013). Both positive and significant.

global_notes: Two MTurk experiments testing Rule of 72 video on financial deliberative competence. 69 specs. Control variations all significant. Sample restrictions mostly robust (65% sig). Alternative treatment arms (Rule72 only, Rhetoric only) show weaker effects. Placebo (simple frame WTP) correctly null.
